p: Lastly, 19 (65%) of the 31 respondent countries reported availability of antiviral drugs for the treatment of influenza; nine in both the public and private sector, six in the public sector only and four in the private sector only (Table 1). La Réunion also reported availability of antiviral drugs in both the private and public sectors. Cameroon, Egypt, Ghana and South Africa reported having national guidelines for the use of these antiviral drugs.
